ygData.subject: Re: Unfair?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, this has been in place for a long time.  As you improve your magical skills you can regain your concentration and continue casting.  This has been
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, this has been in place for a long time. As you improve your magical
skills you can "regain your concentration" and continue casting. This has
been around a while, but thanks for the input.



-----Original Message-----
From: John Penman [mailto:jpenman@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 11:43 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Unfair?


From: "John Penman" <jpenman@...>

Well I think they have taken some of this in to consideration because it
seems they added somehting new to last nights patch. During the game last
night I received a message while in combat taht stated "You regained
concentration" and it cast my spells after it told me I lost concentration.
Could be the first steps...? Who knows.

Shadair
